message: I found one of my apps down ("instance could not be started") this morning, with a bunch of errors about stale app dirs in the console. Not sure if this is still a leftover from the outage monday or something i should look at in my app setup.
It was a related blip, and the warnings about stale app dirs are a filehandle that's gone wrong
we're working to fix it now
@andrewgodwin My app fails to run too. It keeps logging error messages such as this: http://pastebin.com/bq4SPRhx . Thanks
@reshefm Are you sure that's not just browsers disconnecting early? Broken pipe errors on the send() throw those if the other end abruptly closes the connection...
